rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance that opens into a spacious living-dining area with integrated kitchenette. Adheres to Vastu principles by orienting the entrance in the northeast direction.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A central open courtyard acting as a light well and communal space, enhancing ventilation and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Single bedroom with attached bathroom for guests. Incorporates a balcony for privacy and fresh air.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space situated in the northeast corner for positive energy as per Vastu, ensuring minimal distractions.

rooms.name: Utility & Service Area
rooms.description: Space for storage and utility services such as laundry and additional storage.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with integrated walk-in closet and private balcony ensuring tranquility as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional master bedroom equipped with personal balcony for fresh air, positioned in the east direction to harness morning light.

rooms.name: Children's Bedroom
rooms.description: Shared bedroom space with a window and a small balcony for natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Balcony Corridor
rooms.description: Linked balconies connecting the bedrooms to offer views of the courtyard while maintaining privacy, designed in harmony with Vastu principles.

budget_considerations.material_efficiency: Use cost-effective, locally sourced materials and prefabricated components where possible.
budget_considerations.space_optimization: Maximize utility of each room by multi-functional spaces (e.g., living-dining combined area).
budget_considerations.energy_savings: Incorporate passive solar design elements to reduce energy consumption.

vastu_considerations.water_and_sanitation: South-west location recommended for plumbing fixtures to avoid negative energy flow.
vastu_considerations.bedroom_orientation: North and east directions preferred for bedrooms to promote positivity and health.
